text: Jerry Douglas (November 15, 1935 â€“ January 9, 2021) was an American pornographic director and screenwriter. He was born in Des Moines, Iowa. He was known for directing many gay porno movies. He directed the play The Deep Throat Sex Scandal in 2010 and the 1999 gay porno Dream Team. He also wrote the screenplay for Score (1974). Douglas died on January 9, 2021 in New York City, aged 85.Updated: Acclaimed Director, Author Jerry Douglas Passes ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American movie directors Category:American theatre directors Category:American screenwriters Category:LGBT directors Category:LGBT screenwriters Category:Gay men Category:Writers from Des Moines, Iowa
title: Jerry Douglas (director)
